title: Introducing: Raia Was
body: Rachel Brotman spent the tail end of last year on tour with Autre Ne Veut, and since coming back has reinvented herself under the **Raia Was** moniker. Originally put on to her by a collaboration of hers with Tyler Gilmore, her solo track, _Grant it Cause_, available on her Soundcloud, is a luscious concoction of disjointed beats and almost whispered, layered vocals, all shimmering with an ethereal and ephemeral quality. Truly, this is rather special. Check out _Grant it Cause_ below, as well as the aforementioned collab. Robot Carnival by raia was & tyler gilmore
